name: New Dawn Fades
description:
Memories and how they get molded by music.

New Dawn Fades from Ansh Patel on Vimeo.

Reflections of my own relationship with my memories filtered through Joy Division's "New Dawn Fades" over the years.

Probably my most explicitly autobiographical work. A short visual, interactive poem made over a weekend as a response/inspired by Nina Freeman's work.

Song owned by Joy Division and their associated label.

Spacebar is the only key.

Warning:

Bright flashes of color.
